title: AddonCatalog
description: A catalog of addons indexed by addon ID. Each ID maps to a list of AddonCatalogEntry objects.

freecad_min.description: Minimum compatible FreeCAD version (inclusive, Semantic Versioning)

freecad_max.description: Maximum compatible FreeCAD version (inclusive, Semantic Versioning)

git_ref.description: Git reference (e.g. SHA, branch, or tag)

zip_url.description: Direct download link for a .zip file. If git information is also present, this should correspond to a ZIP download link that will result in the same code as a checkout of the given git repo and ref.

note.description: Notes about this addon version. Not displayed, only for reference in the JSON catalog file.

branch_display_name.description: Display name for the addon version branch. If omitted, the git ref is used.
